HomePage.tagline: Eat Good, Eat Safe. Always! Now with the EatSure promise.
HomePage.minitagline: To keep your food safe and hygienic, here are some proactive steps that we have been taking.

precautions.pre1: Real-time Temperature Tracking of the kitchen and delivery staff

precautions.pre3: Regular health check-ups for all the staff members
